shortform.datainsight.chart.component.sh: This refers to the Shortform with the highest Detail Views during the corresponding period. Rankings are determined based on watch time. If they have the same watch time, rankings are determined in order of the most recently registered.

This refers to the Shortfrom with the highest Watch Time on the Shortform feed during the corresponding period. If they have the same watch time, rankings are determined by page views. If they also have the same page views, rankings are determined in order of the most recently registered.

This is the ranking of Product Clicks on Shortform videos. If Shortform videos have the same number of product clicks, the ranking is determined by considering both page views and watch time together.
This is the ranking of Likes on Shortform videos. If Shortform videos have the same number of likes, the ranking is determined by considering both page views and watch time together.
This is the ranking of Shares on Shortform videos. If Shortform videos have the same number of shares, the ranking is determined by considering both page views and watch time together.

This is the ranking of Comments on Shortform videos. If Shortform videos have the same number of comments, the ranking is determined by considering both page views and  watch time together. The ranking is based on the creation of comments, and comments that are deleted later are not taken into account.
This is the Comments ranking. If they have the same number of Comments, Rankings are determined by taking into account both page views and watch time.

page.ai_clip.subtitle_tip_modal.title: Tips for editing subtitles
page.ai_clip.subtitle_tip_modal.tip_card: To edit words, move the cursor or click on them.
To split the subtitles into segments, move the cursor or click on the space between words to activate the cursor, then press the Enter key.
To merge the current segment with the previous one, move the cursor or click on the far left of the first word to activate the cursor, then press the Backspace key.
To create a line break within a segment, move the cursor or click on a word to activate the cursor at the desired break point, then press Shift + Enter.

To delete words, hover over the word and click the 'Delete' button, or click on the far right of the word to activate the cursor, then press the Backspace key.
The corresponding segment of the video will also be deleted along with the words.
If you don't want the segment to be deleted from the video, hover over the word and click the 'Hide' button to hide just the subtitles.
